001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.authentication;
002
003/**
004 * Represents user login credentials.
005 *
006 * <p>This interface defines the structure for storing and retrieving authentication
007 * credentials used in UI-based login processes. Implementations of this interface
008 * should provide user-specific credentials such as username and password.
009 *
010 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate ğŸ’ğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»
011 */
012public interface LoginCredentials {
013
014   /**
015    * Retrieves the username associated with these credentials.
016    *
017    * @return The username.
018    */
019   String username();
020
021   /**
022    * Retrieves the password associated with these credentials.
023    *
024    * @return The password.
025    */
026   String password();
027
028}
